version_description:
• Possible battery drain issue fixed
• Watch App & Complications improvements
• Open URL improvements
Ongoing improvements and bug-fixes.

Happy New Year 2019

--- What's New --- Version 1.4.3 ---
• Apple Watch: Improvements
(New Settings, Syncing, Complications, Month-View, Creating events and reminders, ...)
• Natural Language Input: Noon bug fix
• Location: Improvements
• Exchange Tasks: Location fix
Minor bug-fixes and improvements

*NEW* Custom Colors for events and reminders
*NEW* Theme option "Pure Black"
*NEW* All dialogs themed
*NEW* Sortable Calendar Sets

• 15 minutes steps (Week and Day)
• Time Zone issues fixed (Notifications and Details Dialog)
• Moving reminders fixed
• Memory management and performance improved
• Minor bug-fixes

*NEW* Custom Colors for events and reminders
*NEW* Theme option "Pure Black"
*NEW* All dialogs themed
*NEW* Sortable Calendar Sets

• 15 minutes steps (Week and Day)
• Time Zone issues fixed (Notifications and Details Dialog)
• Moving reminders fixed
• Memory management and performance improved

--- New in Calendar 366 v1.5.1 ---
• Bug-fixes

*NEW* Custom Colors for events and reminders
*NEW* Theme option "Pure Black"
*NEW* All dialogs themed
*NEW* Sortable Calendar Sets
*NEW* Traditional Chinese

--- New in Calendar 366 v1.5.2 ---
• March bug fixed
• Location company search fixed
• Title formatting fixed
• Minor bug-fixes

*NEW* Adjustable Font Sizes
*NEW* Rich Notifications
*NEW* Location Based Reminders
*NEW* Background App Refresh

Improvements:
• Revised Agenda View
• Revised Translations
• Apple Watch Scribble
• Dark(est) Map
• Under-the-Hood improvements

Bug-Fixes
• Search bug fixed
• iCloud attachments bug-fix
• March bug fixed (again)
• Open maps bug fixed
• Proximity view fixed
• Minor bug-fixes

*NEW* Adjustable Font Sizes
*NEW* Rich Notifications
*NEW* Location Based Reminders
*NEW* Background App Refresh

--- New in Calendar 366 v1.6.1 ---
• Minor bug-fixes

*NEW* Extended Travel Time Support (Calculate travel times, Visual Feedback)
*NEW* Search Past Events (too)
*NEW* Default Availability

Improved:
• Watch Complications (Custom Colors)
• Calendar Settings

Fixed:
• Split View (iPad 12.9)
• Navigation Date
• First day of week (Tue-Sat)
• Open Invitations Indicator

Ongoing improvements to stability and performance.

*NEW* Extended Travel Time Support (Calculate travel times, Visual Feedback)
*NEW* Search Past Events (too)
*NEW* Default Availability

Improved:
• Watch Complications (Custom Colors)
• Calendar Settings

--- New in Calendar 366 v1.6.6 ---
Bug fixes and stability improvements

Hey Siri, Welcome Watch Face, Hello Shortcuts!

*New* Siri Shortcuts
*New* Apple Watch Face Support
*New* App Time Zone Support
